channel.title: Project Fozen Fury Account Passwords
channel.description: Ok so i made an account to test server but when i logg out to save account i go to char files and the password is not what i had changed it to its random numbers like 33303283029 how would i change it so i see exactly what the players have made there passwords

item.title: Project Fozen Fury Account Passwords
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“I am Nick, post:11, topic:427859”][quote author=Nonamee link=topic=530553.msg3874432#msg3874432 date=1325560132]
Why would you want to have it decrypted? You really don’t need to know their passwords. I honestly don’t know how, but really, if you’d want it decrypted, that’d seem like you’re trying to hack people.
[/quote]
^^^^^^^^^^^^
also if you have it decrypted you have a risk of getting your account stolen by someone trying to help you on teamviewer and they really quickly open your file and login and spawn stuff and give himself hidden admin on a secret account thats just one thing I could name atleast 10 others but I don’t have time for that so I think you should just keep it decrypted I have mine decrypted but I wish it wasn’t.[/quote]
Yeah that too, or hack their runescape account(some people use the same info).

@Nick
Encrypt the passwords then. It’s not so hard.

Read full topic

I’d rather have it encrypted, if I could find out how to do it.

item.title: Project Fozen Fury Account Passwords
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:5, topic:427859”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=530553.msg3874411#msg3874411 date=1325558821]

Why would you need to do that? Those passwords should only be known by the player and the player only. It’s supposed to be confidential.

This too…
[/quote]
try creating another account with the password you desire, then log off
replace the password from the new account to the old one
it needs no skill lol[/quote]
If the hashing was proper then it wouldn’t be the same.

Read full topic
